snippet: The judge in Jerry Sandusky’s child sex-abuse case rejected a defense request for a two-month delay in the start of the trial.
abstract: Pennsylvania Judge John Cleland, who is presiding over the Jerry Sandusky child sex-abuse case, rejects a defense request for a two-month delay in the start of the trial.
lead_paragraph: The judge in Jerry Sandusky’s child sex-abuse case rejected a defense request for a two-month delay in the start of the trial.

headline.seo: Judge Rejects Delay in Sandusky Case
headline.main: Judge Rejects Delay in Sandusky Case
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects Delay in Sandusky Case
